Title: Induction Therapy
Des: Upon restoring HP, deals <color=#0E70BD>60000</color> True DMG to all units on the battlefield. This effect has a 1s cooldown.

Title: Grand Entrance
Des: Upon entering battle, character gains <color=#0E70BD>30%</color> Extra DMG Reduction and <color=#0E70BD>30%</color> Extra DMG Bonus for 8s.

Title: Space Dominator
Des: Enemies are not affected by Matrix.

Title: Proliferation
Des: When an enemy in battle is taken down or after the battle has started for <color=#0E70BD>30s</color>, an <color=#0E70BD>identical enemy</color> will spawn.

Title: Descending Energy
Des: Once in battle, character's <color=#0E70BD>Extra DMG Bonus decreases by 20%</color> every <color=#0E70BD>10s</color>. This effect can stack up to <color=#0E70BD>5 times</color>, and is reset each time a new character is switched in.

Title: Death Battle
Des: Parrying the Mother's attack successfully will deal Extra DMG equal to <color=#0E70BD>2%</color> of Mother's max HP. Failed parry attempt will increase Mother's ATK by <color=#0E70BD>10%</color>.

Title: Angel's Silhouette
Des: When player dodges an attack, a clone of Gabriel will be summoned to <color=#0E70BD>attack the player if the player goes within 5m</color>. The clone summon has a 3s cooldown.

Title: Violent Storm
Des: Voodoo enters Burst Phase periodically. During Burst Phase, Voodoo will gain increased DMG Reduction and <color=#0E70BD>cast lightning</color> near player. Damage Voodoo <color=#0E70BD>70</color> times during Burst Phase to interrupt it.

Title: Quick Maneuver
Des: Character recovers Dodge Gauge <color=#0E70BD>50%</color> faster.

Title: Rift Splash
Des: Dodging an attack successfully will deal True DMG to the attacker equal to <color=#0E70BD>5%</color> of their max HP.

Title: Vulnerability Loading
Des: Dodging an enemy attack will increase the attacker's DMG dealt and taken by <color=#0E70BD>30%</color> for 10s.

Title: Energy Compensation
Des: When Dodge is <color=#0E70BD>above 70%</color>, character's Extra DMG Bonus increases by <color=#0E70BD>30%</color>. When Dodge is <color=#0E70BD>below 70%</color>, character's Extra DMG Bonus decreases by <color=#0E70BD>30%</color>.

Title: Neuro Degeneration
Des: After entering the battle for <color=#0E70BD>10s</color>, character loses <color=#0E70BD>200</color> Dodge Gauge every second.

Title: Flawless Wings
Des: Pterygota Queen's wings <color=#0E70BD>cannot be damaged</color> in phase 2.

Title: The Monarch's Choice
Des: When Qu casts a skill, she will choose between two options: <color=#0E70BD>Flash first then cast the skill</color>, or <color=#0E70BD>cast the skill first, then Flash and cast the skill again</color>.

Title: Physical Soothing
Des: Fu Shen casts Grab Skill <color=#0E70BD>more frequently</color>.

Title: Trickery's End
Des: Defeat <color=#0E70BD>Lilith</color>

Title: Protocol Amplification
Des: Character's Extra DMG Bonus increases by <color=#0E70BD>3%</color> for every <color=#0E70BD>10%</color> HP left.

Title: Sustainability
Des: Pinging <color=#0E70BD>1/2/3</color> Signal Orbs will heal the character for <color=#0E70BD>5%/10%/15%</color> of max HP.

Title: Predation
Des: When any unit deals DMG, if the DMG dealer has <color=#0E70BD>higher HP percentage</color> than the receiver, the Extra DMG Bonus increases by <color=#0E70BD>30%</color>.

Title: Critical Transition
Des: Characters with HP above <color=#0E70BD>50%</color> deal and take <color=#0E70BD>30%</color> more DMG. Characters with HP below <color=#0E70BD>50%</color> have their healing increased by <color=#0E70BD>30%</color>.

Title: Perfectionism
Des: Character deals <color=#0E70BD>30% more</color> DMG when HP is <color=#0E70BD>above 90%</color>.

Title: Black & White Sharks
Des: Every <color=#0E70BD>10s</color>, the White Shark will transform into a Black Shark, <color=#0E70BD>dealing more DMG but also taking more DMG</color>. When player is <color=#0E70BD>attacked by the Black Shark</color>, Shark-speare will exit the Black Shark state.

Title: Thorny Punishment
Des: Once generated, Iron Maiden's thorns will <color=#0E70BD>launch a rain of swords every 6s</color> to attack player.

Title: Herd Warfare
Des: Moon Eater now appears together with a Mechanoid Moon Eater that will <color=#0E70BD>respawn</color> upon defeat. When Moon Eater is taken down, it will <color=#0E70BD>possess Mechanoid Moon Eater and inherit its HP</color>. The battle is won when Moon Eater is taken down for <color=#0E70BD>3 times</color>.

Title: Signal Harmony
Des: For each orb pinged, character gains <color=#0E70BD>1%</color> DMG Bonus for 8s, stacking up to <color=#0E70BD>20%</color>. Triggering this effect again will renew its duration.

Title: Extreme Maneuver
Des: Within <color=#0E70BD>5s</color> after entering the battle, character's Dodge Gauge recovers <color=#0E70BD>100%</color> faster.

Title: Data Restoration
Des: At the beginning of a battle, all surviving characters recover <color=#0E70BD>70%</color> of their max HP.

Title: Vulnerable Structure
Des: Enemies take increased Physical DMG.

Title: Corrupted Anchor
Des: Enemies apply Marks to themselves each time they <color=#0E70BD>take damage</color>, with <color=#0E70BD>at least a 0.1s</color> interval between each application. Enemies die when their Marks reach <color=#0E70BD>100</color>.

Title: Resonating Will
Des: All characters' ATK increases by <color=#0E70BD>25</color> each time any character <color=#0E70BD>deals damage</color>. This effect stacks up to <color=#0E70BD>30 times</color>.

Title: Overload Suppression
Des: Enemies will reduce all their Resistance by <color=#0E70BD>2%</color> for <color=#0E70BD>8s</color> each time they <color=#0E70BD>take damage</color>. This effect stacks up to <color=#0E70BD>20 times</color>. Duration resets every time the effect is triggered.

Title: Unscathed
Des: Characters' DMG increases by <color=#0E70BD>40%</color>. This Bonus is removed when any character <color=#0E70BD>takes a hit</color>, and all characters' DMG decreases by <color=#0E70BD>5%</color> for 5s.

Title: Recurring Barriers
Des: Enemies gain a shield with capacity equal to <color=#0E70BD>10%</color> of current HP every <color=#0E70BD>10s</color>. The shield lasts <color=#0E70BD>2s</color>.

Title: Recovered Energy
Des: There is a <color=#0E70BD>20% chance</color> to refund the Signal Orbs pinged every time a character pings <color=#0E70BD>regular Signal Orbs</color> manually.

Title: Glory
Des: Defeat Trailblazer <color=#0E70BD>Phase 1</color>.

Title: Berserk
Des: All characters gradually <color=#0E70BD>lose their Signature Energy</color> after <color=#0E70BD>1m 30s</color>. The character on the field will <color=#0E70BD>lose HP every second</color>, and the amount lost per second will <color=#0E70BD>increase over time</color>.

Title: Perpetual Wound
Des: Every second, enemies take True DMG equal to 400% of character's ATK.

Title: Invincible Effulgence
Des: After taking DMG, the character will not take any DMG for the next 4s.

Title: Courageous Pursuit
Des: Dealing DMG also increases DMG dealt by 5%. This effect stacks up to 10 times, and is reset after being attacked by an enemy.

Title: Pressured and Forced
Des: Character has permanent Super Armor but takes 25% more DMG.

Title: Lure of the Wild
Des: "After a successful parry, enemy takes 30% more DMG for 5s. After a failed parry, enemy gains 18% DMG Reduction for 5s. Stacks up to 5 times."

Title: Noxious Claws
Des: "After a successful parry, enemy takes 30% more DMG for 5s. After a failed parry, enemy gains 18% DMG Reduction for 5s. Stacks up to 5 times."

Title: Efficacious Recurrence
Des: Casting Signature restores 1 set of Signal Orbs.

Title: Time-Conflict Impact
Des: All enemies lose 15% HP immediately when Matrix is activated.

Title: Obstructing Sequence
Des: Entering Matrix freezes the enemy for 8s (making them unable to move) and increases the character's DMG dealt by a further 25%.

Title: Unbounded Flash
Des: When Matrix ends, it is triggered again immediately.

Title: Phase Stack
Des: Entering Matrix increases the DMG dealt by all units by 15% for 15s, stacking up to 3 times.

Title: Agent of Willpower
Des: The enemy creates a clone upon spawning and when it enters Phase 2.

Title: Relentless Endurance
Des: The cooldown of character's Matrix decreases significantly. Dodging 2 times within 1s will empty the Dodge Gauge.

Title: Equilibrium Field
Des: Ballard gains 30% Equilibrium Field Shield upon his first entrance and when he enters Phase 2.

Title: Annihilator Boost
Des: The entire team's DMG increases by 20% for every different character type in the team.

Title: Energy Overflow
Des: Deals additional 100000 True DMG to all enemies when casting Signature.

Title: Surging Fight Will
Des: Restores 10 Signature Energy every second for 3s after casting Signature.

Title: Freezing Fragility
Des: Freezes all enemies and makes them receive more damage after casting Signature.

Title: Discharge Reload
Des: Restores 1 set of Signal Orbs after casting Signature.

Title: Narrow Opening
Des: When an enemy takes Signature Move DMG while casting a skill, increases all the damage they take by 30% in the next 5s.

Title: Quantization Chain
Des: Riot will split into two Extreme A'Maos upon death. And an Extreme A'Mao will split into two Enhanced A'Maos upon death.

Title: Counter Stance
Des: Character takes 15% less damage and deals 30% more damage with a shield.

Title: Lightning Shield
Des: When attacked, the enemy has a 15-25% chance to unleash a lightning strike at the attacker's location, dealing 20% Lightning DMG. 3s cooldown. The farther from the target, the higher chance it will be triggered.

Title: Savage Bloodlust
Des: Dealing DMG to enemies increases your own DMG by 0.5%. Stacks up to 100 times.

Title: Withering Log
Des: The character's Extra DMG Reduction increases by 40%

Title: The Weakening Army
Des: Enemies that take DMG will increase their own DMG by 2% and decrease their DMG Reduction by 2% for 6s, stacking up to 20 times.

Title: Lord of Invincibility
Des: Alpha is in the Super Armor state and is immune to Matrix. DMG she deals to Lucia will increase by 30% and DMG taken from Lucia's attacks will also increase by 30%

Title: Bubbling Mirage
Des: Due to the limited space, characters attacked by Lilith will lose Signal Orbs (Cooldown: 1s.)

Title: Waning Vitality
Des: Characters that take DMG will be afflicted with the Venom Effect, causing them to lose 1% of their Max HP every second, stacking up to 5 times. Switching the character off-field will remove this effect.

Title: Crimson Fist of Ruin
Des: There will be an extra Fire Check when the enemy attacks with both fists. Targets hit will enter the Ignited State and lose 4 Energy every second for 3s.

Title: Endless Life
Des: DMG increases by 40% for 8s after the character casts Signature. Duration resets every time the effect is triggered.

Title: Withering Nightmare
Des: Enemy DMG Reduction decreases by 30%.

Title: Feeble Shackles
Des: Enemies gain one stack of "Frail" per second, reducing DMG Reduction by 10%. This can stack up to 5 times and has no duration.

Title: Valor's Resolve
Des: The character gains 30% DMG Reduction for 5s after casting Signature Move. Duration resets every time the effect is triggered.

Title: Eternal Stillness
Des: All enemies' DMG Reduction decreases by 30% for 5s after each Signature Move.

Title: Trickwheel Devour
Des: Enemies gain "Hardened" every 8s, increasing DMG Reduction by 5%, stacking up to 6 times. 3 stacks can be removed by dodging attacks. If "Hardened" stacks drop below 3, "Frail" is added, reducing the enemy's DMG Reduction by 10%.

Title: Dragon Breath
Des: The Dragon will attack with different elements at regular intervals.

Title: Doomstalker
Des: If the Parry Skill type is the same as the previous one, the enemy gains one stack of "Hardened": 5% DMG Reduction for 8s. If it's different, the enemy gains one stack of "Frail": 10% lower DMG Reduction for 8s.

Title: Brilliant Starflare
Des: All damage increases by 30% for 3s after a Basic Attack. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Title: Impregnable Fortress
Des: Character gains a 5-second 3000 shield upon entering the battlefield or every 5s. When with a shield, increases Extra DMG Bonus by 30%.

Title: Survival Instinct
Des: Characters on the battlefield gain an 8-second 3000 shield upon dealing damage to the enemy. Cooldown: 5s.

Title: Protection of Arrows
Des: Character gains a 10-second 4000 shield upon casting Signature.

Title: Wound Penetration
Des: Character gains an 8-second 4000 shield every time when attacked. Cooldown: 5s.

Title: Silver Lining
Des: Gains a 5-second 5000 shield upon successful dodge of an enemy's attack. Cooldown: 5s.

Title: Phantom Pain Remains
Des: Vonnegut gains an Equilibrium Field equal to 15% of his Max HP and grants a 10-second 6000 shield to the character at the beginning of the battle and upon losing 60%/30% respectively.

Title: Spired Fortress
Des: Characters with a shield gain 30% Extra DMG Bonus.

Title: Dream Overture
Des: Enemies are stunned for 2s after attacking.

Title: Marching Melody
Des: Characters on the field recover 100 HP and 25 Dodge Gauge per second.

Title: Ballad of Fright
Des: Enemy's initial Extra DMG Reduction decreases by 10%, followed by a further reduction of 10% every 10s. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

Title: Wild Noise
Des: Every 10s, grants Noise to a random enemy in battle for 6s. The enemy with Noise gains Extra DMG Reduction, while other enemies lose 5% Extra DMG Reduction.

Title: Fanatic Outro
Des: Enemies gain 5% DMG Bonus and lose 5% Physical Resistance for every 10% HP lost.

Title: Metallic Howl
Des: Siren periodically summons Red Tide to block vision, and sings a song periodically to recover 10 Energy, 3% HP, and 100 Dodge Gauge for characters on the field every second over 5s.

Title: Monologue
Des: CRIT DMG increases by 45% for 10s after a 3-Ping

Title: Shield Blast
Des: The character always has a Shield of 3000 points. When the Shield is broken, it will reduce every enemy's HP by 1000% of their HP.

Title: Removal Upon Exit
Des: When on the battlefield, the character gains a 10% all DMG Bonus every 3s. Max 3 stacks. Removal upon exit. Calculated separately for each character.

Title: Invulnerability Zone
Des: By default, the enemy loses HP equal to 120% of the character's ATK every second. The character loses the effect when hit and regains it if not hit for the next 5s.

Title: The Matrix
Des: Upon entering the Matrix, the character restores 250 Dodge Gauge value and reduces the enemy's Extra DMG Reduction by 20% for 8s. Effect cannot be stacked.

Title: Unbreakable Shield
Des: The character on the battlefield always has a shield capable of blocking 1 attack. The shield also grants a 25% all DMG Bonus. The character loses the effect when hit and regains it if not hit for the next 5s.

Title: Dodge Deed
Des: Dodge Gauge recovery speed increases by 50%. Nigel reduces the character's Dodge Gauge by 250 points on hit. Cooldown: 5s.

Title: Super Support
Des: Upon casting a QTE Skill, restores 300 Dodge Gauge value to the character on the battlefield and grants the character a 20% all DMG Bonus for the next 10s. Effect can be stacked.

Title: Triple Amplification
Des: After each 3-Ping, character's all Elemental DMG increases by 20% for 10s, stacking up to 3 times. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Title: Energy Boost Shield
Des: Switching characters grants a Shield that blocks 3 attacks. While the Shield is active, gains 5 Signature Energy per second. The Shield disappears when switching out.

Title: Titan Shield
Des: Switching characters grants a Shield that blocks 3 attacks. While the Shield is active, gains a 50% Extra DMG Bonus. The Shield disappears when switching out.

Title: Disabling Shatter
Des: Switching characters grants a Shield that blocks 1 attack. When hit after the Shield is lost, loses 5 Signature Energy per second for 5s. The Shield disappears when switching out.

Title: Corrupting Shatter
Des: Switching characters grants a Shield that blocks 1 attack. When hit without a Shield, loses 5% of current HP per second for 10s. The Shield disappears when switching out.

Title: Blade Flash
Des: When entering battle, gains 5 stacks of damage increase effect. Each stack increases Attack by 5% and all DMG by 5%. Loses 1 stack every 10s.

Title: Ultralimit Hacker
Des: When dodging to enter Matrix, deals True DMG equal to 6% of enemies' HP.

Title: Speed Maniac
Des: When consuming Dodge Gauge, gains 8% Extra DMG Bonus for 12s. Stacks up to 4 times. Effect persists when switching characters.

Title: Overflowing Will
Des: When the active character is at 100% HP, all elemental DMG increases by 75%. Effect lasts indefinitely and does not stack.
